name: Oh God, What Happened At Persephone-23?
name_original: Oh God, What Happened At Persephone-23?
description:
You work for a massive interstellar corporation, slaving off your debt for the rest of your life. On your way back home from your most recent job, your ship picks up an emergency distress signal from a relatively nearby lunar base called Persephone-23. 

When you arrive at the base, you find that everything has gone terribly wrong...

Made for the #wscajam and free for the duration of it.
